articles.title: U.S. unseals warrant behind oil tanker seizure near Venezuela - Axios
articles.description: The FBI director said the bureau will keep enforcing U.S. sanctions and "cut off our adversaries from financial markets" and tech.
articles.content:
• The sanctions escalate the Trump administration's campaign to choke off what it calls illicit oil flows tied to Iran and Maduro's government in Caracas.

articles.title: Wall Street Skips Tech and Goes Old School for Growth in 2026 - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: One theme is becoming prevalent as the new year approaches: The technology giants that have been shouldering this bull market will no longer be running the show.
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump tech adviser David Sacks under fire over vast AI investments - NPR
articles.description: Sacks is the Trump administration's top advisor on tech and crypto policy. In recent weeks, he's faced questions about conflicts of interest and criticism over his drive to undo state AI laws.
articles.content: David Sacks, President Trump's influential adviser on artificial intelligence and cryptocurrency, is on the defensive over government paperwork that critics say grant him "carte blanche" to shape U.S… [+6902 chars]
